    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Enveloping Light](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1290)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattoo

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This tattoo is a series of six concentric circles that show up as a soft yellow on any skin tone. The marks carry in them a protective force that bolsters your body and soul. The first time each day that someone attempts to [Treat your Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=57) and rolls a critical failure, they get a failure instead.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** For 5 rounds, your entire body begins to glow, with the effects of a 1st-level [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171) spell. At the end of each of your turns during this time, you regain 1d4 Hit Points.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

Any time someone rolls a critical failure to Treat your Wounds, they get a failure instead. The glow has the effects of a 4th-level _light_ spell, and you regain 2d8 Hit Points per round.
